actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to provide that interest shall be paid with respect to underpayments of social security benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to require the payment of interest on the balance due a beneficiary on account of an underpayment of title II benefits.

titles.title: A bill to provide that interest shall be paid with respect to underpayments of social security benefits.
